function.name: write_design_doc
function.description: Create a new design document containing high-level system design, specifications, or plans.

file.description: Relative path of the design document to create.

function.name: update_design_doc
function.description: Overwrite an existing design document with updated content.

function.name: append_design_note
function.description: Append a new design or progress note into a document. Used to show what the designer is currently working on.

function.name: save_task_breakdown
function.description: Save a structured task breakdown for the current project stage.

function.name: read_design_doc
function.description: Read and return the content of an existing design document.

function.name: save_diagram
function.description: Save an ASCII or text-based architecture diagram.

function.name: write_agent_update
function.description: Share a short progress or requirements update with the programmer and validator agents.

role.description: Agent role submitting the update (e.g., designer).

message.description: Summary of decisions, blockers, or clarifications to broadcast.

audience.description: Optional audience filter such as programmer, validator, or all.

function.name: read_agent_updates
function.description: Read the most recent shared updates from other agents.

audience.description: Filter updates intended for a specific audience or 'all'.
